attributes.action: To stop the petition to have another EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131215

We need to stop it due to the ridiculousness of trying to make statistics to day that we need 60% or above for either leave or remain and if less than 75% of people vote then it should be that way, but the people have spoken and it's tough.
attributes.background: There has been a petition on this website to have another EU Referendum, but the people of Britain have to learn that the public have spoke and that 1.3million more people voted leave rather than stay. They are trying to implement stats to therefore try and get their own way due to loosing.
